comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: adguard.info
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://adguard.info/kb/ru/guides/report-website/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadguard.info%2Fkb%2Fru%2Fguides%2Freport-website%2F) ### Comment > Рандомная проблема, сайты могут как загружаться с небольшой задержкой, так и не загружаться вовсе. При отключении Adguard всё работает исправно. > Проблема началась с версии 7.22.1, тогда на сколько я знаю проблема была общая. Не дожидаясь обновления я перешёл на первую публичную 8 бету, всё работало. Потом прилетело обновление Беты и она перестала нормально работать, защита то включалась то выключалась, удалил. После этого поставил 7.22.3 - два дня проблем не знал и вот опять. Всё настроено по дефолту, никаких левых пользовательских фильтров. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/smuls7o87z4kcoko8gcgck4oskk0g4sqmjhdhjkaxc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/jlxqxpnty1c884ww8kcss8k8sssssoo2obiuo0t8qo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 System version: | `Windows 11 Pro, версия 25H2 (26200.7462)` Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Send Do-Not-Track header DNS filtering: | server: `Adguard из вашего же приложения`
Filters: | Ad blocking:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 7 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.welt.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: app.raindrop.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.raindrop.io/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raindrop.io%2F) ### Comment > 1) Run Adguard. > > 2) Try to open webpage in browser - https://app.raindrop.io/ > > It doesn't open. > > To resolve this issue do following, > > 1) Disable Protection from Adguard's taskbar running application. > > 2) Same webpage opens fine. > > --- > > Furthermore, > > 1) Even with Ad Blocking, Tracking Protection, Browser Security, Browser Assistant & Extension Settings items being Disabled. > > 2) Webpage in question still Does Not open. > > Only if Disable Protection is set from taskbar does the webpage work even in this condition. > > --- > > 1) Also, disabling WFP Network Driver (but keeping Enable Traffic Filtering icon ticked) then System Restarting. > > 2) The webpage works again, this time even if all the Filters< Tracking, Browser Security/Assistant/Extensions, etc running normally. > > It most definitely is related to WFP. First there were BSOD & now this. This driver needs serious and URGENT work. Like 1st priority level. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/osikbx7dl5ccg8owo04cc448wgs0sggoukgzhwi3cc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/itd6v15n6x44kogwcg0o8kscsgokwo4ikcrvf867s0.png?nc=1)

filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `Kaspersky Antivirus` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.3+%285240%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26200.0&browser=edge&filters=2&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)

issue.title: app.raindrop.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.raindrop.io/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raindrop.io%2F) ### Comment > 1) Run Adguard. > > 2) Try to open webpage in browser - https://app.raindrop.io/ > > It doesn't open. > > To resolve this issue do following, > > 1) Disable Protection from Adguard's taskbar running application. > > 2) Same webpage opens fine. > > --- > > Furthermore, > > 1) Even with Ad Blocking, Tracking Protection, Browser Security, Browser Assistant & Extension Settings items being Disabled. > > 2) Webpage in question still Does Not open. > > Only if Disable Protection is set from taskbar does the webpage work even in this condition. > > --- > > 1) Also, disabling WFP Network Driver (but keeping Enable Traffic Filtering icon ticked) then System Restarting. > > 2) The webpage works again, this time even if all the Filters< Tracking, Browser Security/Assistant/Extensions, etc running normally. > > It most definitely is related to WFP. First there were BSOD & now this. This driver needs serious and URGENT work. Like 1st priority level. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/osikbx7dl5ccg8owo04cc448wgs0sggoukgzhwi3cc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/itd6v15n6x44kogwcg0o8kscsgokwo4ikcrvf867s0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 (5240) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26200.0` Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `Kaspersky Antivirus` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.3+%285240%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26200.0&browser=edge&filters=2&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
